channel.title: Making new maps ( 508 CACHE)
channel.description:
Ok, i've tried making custom maps via editing client and source, but i found it difficult.
So is there any way to edit it, I hope that u got a [u]508[/u] cache editor. that have the ability to add new maps/npcs/items/etc...
